chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat), SysPrf T (forallH v (notH f)) -> SysPrf T (notH (existH v f))

Premises:
notH = fol.notH LNN : fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN
forallH : nat -> fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
System = fol.System LNN : Type
SysPrf = folProof.SysPrf LNN : fol.System LNN -> fol.Formula LNN -> Prop
existH = fol.existH LNN : nat -> fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN Arguments existH _%nat_scope
Formula = fol.Formula LNN : Set
nForall : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat), SysPrf T (existH v (notH f)) -> SysPrf T (notH (forallH v f))
forallSimp : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat), SysPrf T (forallH v f) -> SysPrf T f
forallI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNN v T -> SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (forallH v f)
existSimp : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (existH v f)
existSys : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNN v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNN g) -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T f) g -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T (existH v f)) g
nnI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (notH (notH f))
nnE : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), SysPrf T (notH (notH f)) -> SysPrf T f
existE : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNN v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNN g) -> SysPrf T (existH v f) -> SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T g
absurd1 : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), SysPrf T (impH f (notH f)) -> SysPrf T (notH f)
forallE : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat) (t : Term), SysPrf T (forallH v f) -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN f v t)
existI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat) (t : Term), SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN f v t) -> SysPrf T (existH v f)
folLogic.nForall : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.existH L v (fol.notH L f)) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.notH L (fol.forallH L v f))
nOr : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (andH (notH f) (notH g)) -> SysPrf T (notH (orH f g))
nAnd : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (orH (notH f) (notH g)) -> SysPrf T (notH (andH f g))
nImp : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (andH f (notH g)) -> SysPrf T (notH (impH f g))
cp1 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH (notH f) (notH g)) -> SysPrf T (impH g f)
cp2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T (impH (notH f) (notH g))
contradiction : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (notH f) -> SysPrf T g
folLogic.existSys : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula L g) -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T f) g -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T (fol.existH L v f)) g
noMiddle : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), SysPrf T (orH (notH f) f)
folLogic.forallI : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T f -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.forallH L v f)
folLogic.existE : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula L g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.existH L v f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T g
folLogic.forallSimp : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.forallH L v f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T f
folLogic.existSimp : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), folProof.SysPrf L T f -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.existH L v f)
impE : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T f
andI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T (andH f g)
andE2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (andH f g) -> SysPrf T g
andE1 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (andH f g) -> SysPrf T f
orI1 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (orH f g)
orI2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T (orH f g)
orE : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf T (orH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH f h) -> SysPrf T (impH g h) -> SysPrf T h
iffI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T (iffH f g)
iffE1 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH f g)
sysWeaken : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T g) f
iffE2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g f)
folLogic.existI : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (t : fol.Term L), folProof.SysPrf L T (substituteFormula L f v t) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.existH L v f)
folLogic.forallE : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (t : fol.Term L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.forallH L v f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (substituteFormula L f v t)
sysExtend : forall (T U : System) (f : Formula), Included (fol.Formula LNN) T U -> SysPrf T f -> SysPrf U f
impI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T g) f -> SysPrf T (impH g f)
Axm : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), mem (fol.Formula LNN) T f -> SysPrf T f

```coq
intros T f v H. apply nForall in H. apply nnE in H. apply contrapositive in H. apply Axm. assumption.
Qed.```
